abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objective of the Federal
            Universities Development Sector Adjustment Credit Project is
            to assist the Government in its efforts to ensure that the
            federal universities will improve the effectiveness and
            relevance of their teaching and research while at the same
            time becoming more cost effective.  More specifically the
            program aims to : a) encourage universities to reduce the
            recurrent cost per student borne by the Government; b)
            increase internally generated income; c) reduce overstaffing
            and other areas of wastage; d) make more effective use of
            scarce resources available through funds transfers to areas
            more critical for quality teaching and research; e) help
            accelerate the pace of reequipping academic space; and f)
            strengthen institutions for planning, budgeting and procurement.
